register.name: AMAIR_EL1
register.description: Provides IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED memory attributes for the memory regions specified by MAIR_EL1.

register.name: AMAIR_EL2
register.description: Provides IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED memory attributes for the memory regions specified by MAIR_EL2.

register.name: AMAIR_EL3
register.description: Provides IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED memory attributes for the memory regions specified by MAIR_EL3.

register.name: CONTEXTIDR_EL1
register.description: Identifies the current Process Identifier...

bitField.name: PROCID
bitField.description: Process Identifier. This field must be programmed with a unique value that identifies the current process.

register.name: CONTEXTIDR_EL2
register.description: When is implemented and HCR_EL2.E2H is set to 1, identifies the current Process Identifier...

bitField.name: PROCID
bitField.description: Process Identifier. This field must be programmed with a unique value that identifies the current process.

register.name: DACR32_EL2
register.description: Allows access to the AArch32 DACR register from AArch64 state only. Its value has no effect on execution in AArch64 state.

bitField.name: D15
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

bitField.name: D14
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

bitField.name: D13
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

bitField.name: D12
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

bitField.name: D11
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

bitField.name: D10
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

bitField.name: D9
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

bitField.name: D8
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

bitField.name: D7
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

bitField.name: D6
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

bitField.name: D5
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

bitField.name: D4
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

bitField.name: D3
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

bitField.name: D2
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

bitField.name: D1
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

bitField.name: D0
bitField.description: Domain n access permission, where n = 0 to 15.

register.name: LORC_EL1
register.description: Enables and disables LORegions, and selects the current LORegion descriptor.

bitField.name: DS
bitField.description: Descriptor Select. Selects the current LORegion descriptor accessed by LORSA_EL1, LOREA_EL1, and LORN_EL1.

bitField.name: EN
bitField.description: Enable.

register.name: LOREA_EL1
register.description: Holds the physical address of the end of the LORegion described in the current LORegion descriptor selected by LORC_EL1.DS.

bitField.name: EA
bitField.description: Bits [47:16] of the end physical address of an LORegion described in the current LORegion descriptor selected by LORC_EL1.DS. Bits[15:0] of this address are defined to be 0xFFFF.

register.name: LORID_EL1
register.description: Indicates the number of LORegions and LORegion descriptors supported by the PE.

bitField.name: LD
bitField.description: Number of LORegion descriptors supported by the PE. This is an 8-bit binary number.

bitField.name: LR
bitField.description: Number of LORegions supported by the PE. This is an 8-bit binary number.

register.name: LORN_EL1
register.description: Holds the number of the LORegion described in the current LORegion descriptor selected by LORC_EL1.DS.

bitField.name: Num
bitField.description: Number of the LORegion described in the current LORegion descriptor selected by LORC_EL1.DS.

register.name: LORSA_EL1
register.description: Indicates whether the current LORegion descriptor selected by LORC_EL1.DS is enabled, and holds the physical address of the start of the LORegion.

bitField.name: SA
bitField.description: Bits [47:16] of the start physical address of the LORegion described in the current LORegion descriptor selected by LORC_EL1.DS. Bits[15:0] of this address are defined to be 0x0000.

bitField.name: Valid
bitField.description: Indicates whether the current LORegion Descriptor is enabled.

register.name: MAIR_EL1
register.description: Provides the memory attribute encodings corresponding to the possible AttrIndx values in a Long-descriptor format translation table entry for stage 1 translations at EL1.

bitField.name: Attr7
bitField.description: The memory attribute encoding for an AttrIndx[2:0] entry in a Long descriptor format translation table entry, where AttrIndx[2:0] gives the value of <n> in Attr<n>.

bitField.name: Attr6
bitField.description: The memory attribute encoding for an AttrIndx[2:0] entry in a Long descriptor format translation table entry, where AttrIndx[2:0] gives the value of <n> in Attr<n>.

bitField.name: Attr5
bitField.description: The memory attribute encoding for an AttrIndx[2:0] entry in a Long descriptor format translation table entry, where AttrIndx[2:0] gives the value of <n> in Attr<n>.

bitField.name: Attr4
bitField.description: The memory attribute encoding for an AttrIndx[2:0] entry in a Long descriptor format translation table entry, where AttrIndx[2:0] gives the value of <n> in Attr<n>.

bitField.name: Attr3
bitField.description: The memory attribute encoding for an AttrIndx[2:0] entry in a Long descriptor format translation table entry, where AttrIndx[2:0] gives the value of <n> in Attr<n>.

bitField.name: Attr2
bitField.description: The memory attribute encoding for an AttrIndx[2:0] entry in a Long descriptor format translation table entry, where AttrIndx[2:0] gives the value of <n> in Attr<n>.

bitField.name: Attr1
bitField.description: The memory attribute encoding for an AttrIndx[2:0] entry in a Long descriptor format translation table entry, where AttrIndx[2:0] gives the value of <n> in Attr<n>.

bitField.name: Attr0
bitField.description: The memory attribute encoding for an AttrIndx[2:0] entry in a Long descriptor format translation table entry, where AttrIndx[2:0] gives the value of <n> in Attr<n>.

register.name: MAIR_EL2
register.description: Provides the memory attribute encodings corresponding to the possible AttrIndx values in a Long-descriptor format translation table entry for stage 1 translations at EL2.

bitField.name: Attr7
bitField.description: The memory attribute encoding for an AttrIndx[2:0] entry in a Long descriptor format translation table entry, where AttrIndx[2:0] gives the value of <n> in Attr<n>.

bitField.name: Attr6
bitField.description: The memory attribute encoding for an AttrIndx[2:0] entry in a Long descriptor format translation table entry, where AttrIndx[2:0] gives the value of <n> in Attr<n>.

bitField.name: Attr5
bitField.description: The memory attribute encoding for an AttrIndx[2:0] entry in a Long descriptor format translation table entry, where AttrIndx[2:0] gives the value of <n> in Attr<n>.

bitField.name: Attr4
bitField.description: The memory attribute encoding for an AttrIndx[2:0] entry in a Long descriptor format translation table entry, where AttrIndx[2:0] gives the value of <n> in Attr<n>.

bitField.name: Attr3
bitField.description: The memory attribute encoding for an AttrIndx[2:0] entry in a Long descriptor format translation table entry, where AttrIndx[2:0] gives the value of <n> in Attr<n>.

bitField.name: Attr2
bitField.description: The memory attribute encoding for an AttrIndx[2:0] entry in a Long descriptor format translation table entry, where AttrIndx[2:0] gives the value of <n> in Attr<n>.

bitField.name: Attr1
bitField.description: The memory attribute encoding for an AttrIndx[2:0] entry in a Long descriptor format translation table entry, where AttrIndx[2:0] gives the value of <n> in Attr<n>.

bitField.name: Attr0
bitField.description: The memory attribute encoding for an AttrIndx[2:0] entry in a Long descriptor format translation table entry, where AttrIndx[2:0] gives the value of <n> in Attr<n>.

register.name: MAIR_EL3
register.description: Provides the memory attribute encodings corresponding to the possible AttrIndx values in a Long-descriptor format translation table entry for stage 1 translations at EL3.

bitField.name: Attr7
bitField.description: The memory attribute encoding for an AttrIndx[2:0] entry in a Long descriptor format translation table entry, where AttrIndx[2:0] gives the value of <n> in Attr<n>.

bitField.name: Attr6
bitField.description: The memory attribute encoding for an AttrIndx[2:0] entry in a Long descriptor format translation table entry, where AttrIndx[2:0] gives the value of <n> in Attr<n>.

bitField.name: Attr5
bitField.description: The memory attribute encoding for an AttrIndx[2:0] entry in a Long descriptor format translation table entry, where AttrIndx[2:0] gives the value of <n> in Attr<n>.

bitField.name: Attr4
bitField.description: The memory attribute encoding for an AttrIndx[2:0] entry in a Long descriptor format translation table entry, where AttrIndx[2:0] gives the value of <n> in Attr<n>.

bitField.name: Attr3
bitField.description: The memory attribute encoding for an AttrIndx[2:0] entry in a Long descriptor format translation table entry, where AttrIndx[2:0] gives the value of <n> in Attr<n>.

bitField.name: Attr2
bitField.description: The memory attribute encoding for an AttrIndx[2:0] entry in a Long descriptor format translation table entry, where AttrIndx[2:0] gives the value of <n> in Attr<n>.

bitField.name: Attr1
bitField.description: The memory attribute encoding for an AttrIndx[2:0] entry in a Long descriptor format translation table entry, where AttrIndx[2:0] gives the value of <n> in Attr<n>.

bitField.name: Attr0
bitField.description: The memory attribute encoding for an AttrIndx[2:0] entry in a Long descriptor format translation table entry, where AttrIndx[2:0] gives the value of <n> in Attr<n>.

register.name: TCR_EL1
register.description: The control register for stage 1 of the EL1&0 translation regime.

bitField.name: HPD1
bitField.description: Hierarchical Permission Disables. This affects the hierarchical control bits, APTable, PXNTable, and UXNTable, except NSTable, in the translation tables pointed to by TTBR1_EL1.

bitField.name: HPD0
bitField.description: Hierarchical Permission Disables. This affects the hierarchical control bits, APTable, PXNTable, and UXNTable, except NSTable, in the translation tables pointed to by TTBR0_EL1.

bitField.name: HD
bitField.description: Hardware management of dirty state in stage 1 translations from EL0 and EL1.

bitField.name: HA
bitField.description: Hardware Access flag update in stage 1 translations from EL0 and EL1.

bitField.name: TBI1
bitField.description: Top Byte ignored - indicates whether the top byte of an address is used for address match for the TTBR1_EL1 region, or ignored and used for tagged addresses.

bitField.name: TBI0
bitField.description: Top Byte ignored - indicates whether the top byte of an address is used for address match for the TTBR0_EL1 region, or ignored and used for tagged addresses.

bitField.name: AS
bitField.description: ASID Size.

bitField.name: IPS
bitField.description: Intermediate Physical Address Size.

bitField.name: TG1
bitField.description: Granule size for the TTBR1_EL1.

bitField.name: SH1
bitField.description: Shareability attribute for memory associated with translation table walks using TTBR1_EL1.

bitField.name: ORGN1
bitField.description: Outer cacheability attribute for memory associated with translation table walks using TTBR1_EL1.

bitField.name: IRGN1
bitField.description: Inner cacheability attribute for memory associated with translation table walks using TTBR1_EL1.

bitField.name: EPD1
bitField.description: Translation table walk disable for translations using TTBR1_EL1. This bit controls whether a translation table walk is performed on a TLB miss, for an address that is translated using TTBR1_EL1.

bitField.name: A1
bitField.description: Selects whether TTBR0_EL1 or TTBR1_EL1 defines the ASID.

bitField.name: T1SZ
bitField.description: The size offset of the memory region addressed by TTBR1_EL1. The region size is 2^(64-T1SZ) bytes.

bitField.name: TG0
bitField.description: Granule size for the TTBR0_EL1.

bitField.name: SH0
bitField.description: Shareability attribute for memory associated with translation table walks using TTBR0_EL1.

bitField.name: ORGN0
bitField.description: Outer cacheability attribute for memory associated with translation table walks using TTBR0_EL1.

bitField.name: IRGN0
bitField.description: Inner cacheability attribute for memory associated with translation table walks using TTBR0_EL1.

bitField.name: EPD0
bitField.description: Translation table walk disable for translations using TTBR0_EL1. This bit controls whether a translation table walk is performed on a TLB miss, for an address that is translated using TTBR0_EL1.

bitField.name: T0SZ
bitField.description: The size offset of the memory region addressed by TTBR0_EL1. The region size is 2^(64-T0SZ) bytes.

register.name: TCR_EL2
register.description: The control register for stage 1 of the EL2, or EL2&0, translation regime...

bitField.name: TG0
bitField.description: Granule size for the TTBR0_EL2.

bitField.name: SH0
bitField.description: Shareability attribute for memory associated with translation table walks using TTBR0_EL2.

bitField.name: ORGN0
bitField.description: Outer cacheability attribute for memory associated with translation table walks using TTBR0_EL2.

bitField.name: IRGN0
bitField.description: Inner cacheability attribute for memory associated with translation table walks using TTBR0_EL2.

bitField.name: T0SZ
bitField.description: The size offset of the memory region addressed by TTBR0_EL2. The region size is 2^(64-T0SZ) bytes.

register.name: TCR_EL3
register.description: The control register for stage 1 of the EL3 translation regime.

bitField.name: HPD
bitField.description: Hierarchical Permission Disables. This affects the hierarchical control bits, APTable, PXNTable, and UXNTable, except NSTable, in the translation tables pointed to by TTBR0_EL3.

bitField.name: HD
bitField.description: Hardware management of dirty state in stage 1 translations from EL3.

bitField.name: HA
bitField.description: Hardware Access flag update in stage 1 translations from EL3.

bitField.name: TBI
bitField.description: Top Byte ignored - indicates whether the top byte of an address is used for address match for the TTBR0_EL3 region, or ignored and used for tagged addresses.

bitField.name: PS
bitField.description: Physical Address Size.

bitField.name: TG0
bitField.description: Granule size for the TTBR0_EL3.

bitField.name: SH0
bitField.description: Shareability attribute for memory associated with translation table walks using TTBR0_EL3.

bitField.name: ORGN0
bitField.description: Outer cacheability attribute for memory associated with translation table walks using TTBR0_EL3.

bitField.name: IRGN0
bitField.description: Inner cacheability attribute for memory associated with translation table walks using TTBR0_EL3.

bitField.name: T0SZ
bitField.description: The size offset of the memory region addressed by TTBR0_EL3. The region size is 2^(64-T0SZ) bytes.

register.name: TTBR0_EL1
register.description: Holds the base address of the translation table for the initial lookup for stage 1 of the translation of an address from the lower VA range in the EL1&0 translation regime, and other information for this translation regime.

bitField.name: ASID
bitField.description: An ASID for the translation table base address. The TCR_EL1.A1 field selects either TTBR0_EL1.ASID or TTBR1_EL1.ASID.

bitField.name: BADDR
bitField.description: Translation table base address, A[47:x] or A[51:x], bits[47:1].

register.name: TTBR0_EL2
register.description: When HCR_EL2.E2H is 0, holds the base address of the translation table for the initial lookup for stage 1 of an address translation in the EL2 translation regime, and other information for this translation regime...

bitField.name: ASID
bitField.description: When HCR_EL2.E2H is 0, this field is RES0.

bitField.name: BADDR
bitField.description: Translation table base address, A[47:x] or A[51:x], bits[47:1].

register.name: TTBR0_EL3
register.description: Holds the base address of the translation table for the initial lookup for stage 1 of an address translation in the EL3 translation regime, and other information for this translation regime.

bitField.name: BADDR
bitField.description: Translation table base address, A[47:x] or A[51:x].

register.name: TTBR1_EL1
register.description: Holds the base address of the translation table for the initial lookup for stage 1 of the translation of an address from the higher VA range in the EL1&0 stage 1 translation regime, and other information for this translation regime.

bitField.name: ASID
bitField.description: An ASID for the translation table base address. The TCR_EL1.A1 field selects either TTBR0_EL1.ASID or TTBR1_EL1.ASID.

bitField.name: BADDR
bitField.description: Translation table base address, A[47:x] or A[51:x], bits[47:1].

register.name: TTBR1_EL2
register.description: When HCR_EL2.E2H is 1, holds the base address of the translation table for the initial lookup for stage 1 of the translation of an address from the higher VA range in the EL2&0 translation regime, and other information for this translation regime.

bitField.name: ASID
bitField.description: An ASID for the translation table base address. The TCR_EL2.A1 field selects either TTBR0_EL2.ASID or TTBR1_EL2.ASID.

bitField.name: BADDR
bitField.description: Translation table base address, A[47:x] or A[51:x], bits[47:1].

register.name: VTCR_EL2
register.description: The control register for stage 2 of the EL1&0 translation regime.

bitField.name: HD
bitField.description: Hardware management of dirty state in stage 2 translations from Non-secure EL0 and EL1.

bitField.name: HA
bitField.description: Hardware Access flag update in stage 2 translations from Non-secure EL0 and EL1.

bitField.name: VS
bitField.description: VMID Size.

bitField.name: PS
bitField.description: Physical Address Size.

bitField.name: TG0
bitField.description: Granule size for the VTTBR_EL2.

bitField.name: SH0
bitField.description: Shareability attribute for memory associated with translation table walks using VTTBR_EL2.

bitField.name: ORGN0
bitField.description: Outer cacheability attribute for memory associated with translation table walks using VTTBR_EL2.

bitField.name: IRGN0
bitField.description: Inner cacheability attribute for memory associated with translation table walks using VTTBR_EL2.

bitField.name: SL0
bitField.description: Starting level of the VTCR_EL2 addressed region. The meaning of this field depends on the value of VTCR_EL2.TG0 (the granule size).

bitField.name: T0SZ
bitField.description: The size offset of the memory region addressed by VTTBR_EL2. The region size is 2^(64-T0SZ) bytes.

register.name: VTTBR_EL2
register.description: Holds the base address of the translation table for the initial lookup for stage 2 of an address translation in the Non-secure EL1&0 translation regime, and other information for this translation regime.

bitField.name: VMID_15_8
bitField.description: Extension to VMID[7:0]. See VMID[7:0] for more details.

bitField.name: VMID_7_0
bitField.description: The VMID for the translation table.

bitField.name: BADDR
bitField.description: Translation table base address, A[47:x] or A[51:x], bits[47:1].

tcf:enumItem.description: No access. Any access to the domain generates a Domain fault.
tcf:enumItem.name: No_access

tcf:enumItem.description: Client. Accesses are checked against the permission bits in the translation tables.
tcf:enumItem.name: Client

tcf:enumItem.description: Manager. Accesses are not checked against the permission bits in the translation tables.
tcf:enumItem.name: Manager

tcf:enumItem.description: Disabled. Memory accesses do not match any LORegions.
tcf:enumItem.name: Disabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Enabled. Memory accesses may match a LORegion.
tcf:enumItem.name: Enabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Hierarchical permissions are enabled.
tcf:enumItem.name: Hierarchical_permissions_are_enabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Hierarchical permissions are disabled.
tcf:enumItem.name: Hierarchical_permissions_are_disabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Hierarchical permissions are enabled.
tcf:enumItem.name: Hierarchical_permissions_are_enabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Hierarchical permissions are disabled.
tcf:enumItem.name: Hierarchical_permissions_are_disabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Stage 1 hardware management of dirty state disabled.
tcf:enumItem.name: Stage_1_hardware_management_of_dirty_state_disabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Stage 1 hardware management of dirty state enabled, only if the HA bit is also set to 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Stage_1_hardware_management_of_dirty_state_enabled_only_if_the_HA_bit_is_also_set_to_1

tcf:enumItem.description: Stage 1 Access flag update disabled.
tcf:enumItem.name: Stage_1_Access_flag_update_disabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Stage 1 Access flag update enabled.
tcf:enumItem.name: Stage_1_Access_flag_update_enabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Top Byte used in the address calculation.
tcf:enumItem.name: Top_Byte_used_in_the_address_calculation

tcf:enumItem.description: Top Byte ignored in the address calculation.
tcf:enumItem.name: Top_Byte_ignored_in_the_address_calculation

tcf:enumItem.description: Top Byte used in the address calculation.
tcf:enumItem.name: Top_Byte_used_in_the_address_calculation

tcf:enumItem.description: Top Byte ignored in the address calculation.
tcf:enumItem.name: Top_Byte_ignored_in_the_address_calculation

tcf:enumItem.description: 8 bit - the upper 8 bits of TTBR0_EL1 and TTBR1_EL1 are ignored by hardware for every purpose except reading back the register, and are treated as if they are all zeros for when used for allocation and matching entries in the TLB.
tcf:enumItem.name: _8_bit_the_upper_8_bits_of_TTBR0_EL1_and_TTBR1_EL1_are_ignored_by_hardware_for_every_purpose_except_reading_back_the_register_and_are_treated_as_if_they_are_all_zeros_for_when_used_for_allocation_and_matching_entries_in_the_TLB

tcf:enumItem.description: 16 bit - the upper 16 bits of TTBR0_EL1 and TTBR1_EL1 are used for allocation and matching in the TLB.
tcf:enumItem.name: _16_bit_the_upper_16_bits_of_TTBR0_EL1_and_TTBR1_EL1_are_used_for_allocation_and_matching_in_the_TLB

tcf:enumItem.description: 32 bits, 4GB.
tcf:enumItem.name: _32_bits_4GB

tcf:enumItem.description: 36 bits, 64GB.
tcf:enumItem.name: _36_bits_64GB

tcf:enumItem.description: 40 bits, 1TB.
tcf:enumItem.name: _40_bits_1TB

tcf:enumItem.description: 42 bits, 4TB.
tcf:enumItem.name: _42_bits_4TB

tcf:enumItem.description: 44 bits, 16TB.
tcf:enumItem.name: _44_bits_16TB

tcf:enumItem.description: 48 bits, 256TB.
tcf:enumItem.name: _48_bits_256TB

tcf:enumItem.description: Outer Shareable
tcf:enumItem.name: Outer_Shareable

tcf:enumItem.description: Inner Shareable
tcf:enumItem.name: Inner_Shareable

tcf:enumItem.description: Normal memory, Outer Non-cacheable
tcf:enumItem.name: Normal_memory_Outer_Non_cacheable

tcf:enumItem.description: Normal memory, Outer Write-Back Read-Allocate Write-Allocate Cacheable
tcf:enumItem.name: Normal_memory_Outer_Write_Back_Read_Allocate_Write_Allocate_Cacheable

tcf:enumItem.description: Normal memory, Outer Write-Through Read-Allocate No Write-Allocate Cacheable
tcf:enumItem.name: Normal_memory_Outer_Write_Through_Read_Allocate_No_Write_Allocate_Cacheable

tcf:enumItem.description: Normal memory, Outer Write-Back Read-Allocate No Write-Allocate Cacheable
tcf:enumItem.name: Normal_memory_Outer_Write_Back_Read_Allocate_No_Write_Allocate_Cacheable

tcf:enumItem.description: Normal memory, Inner Non-cacheable
tcf:enumItem.name: Normal_memory_Inner_Non_cacheable

tcf:enumItem.description: Normal memory, Inner Write-Back Read-Allocate Write-Allocate Cacheable
tcf:enumItem.name: Normal_memory_Inner_Write_Back_Read_Allocate_Write_Allocate_Cacheable

tcf:enumItem.description: Normal memory, Inner Write-Through Read-Allocate No Write-Allocate Cacheable
tcf:enumItem.name: Normal_memory_Inner_Write_Through_Read_Allocate_No_Write_Allocate_Cacheable

tcf:enumItem.description: Normal memory, Inner Write-Back Read-Allocate No Write-Allocate Cacheable
tcf:enumItem.name: Normal_memory_Inner_Write_Back_Read_Allocate_No_Write_Allocate_Cacheable

tcf:enumItem.description: Perform translation table walks using TTBR1_EL1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Perform_translation_table_walks_using_TTBR1_EL1

tcf:enumItem.description: A TLB miss on an address that is translated using TTBR1_EL1 generates a Translation fault. No translation table walk is performed.
tcf:enumItem.name: A_TLB_miss_on_an_address_that_is_translated_using_TTBR1_EL1_generates_a_Translation_fault

tcf:enumItem.description: TTBR0_EL1.ASID defines the ASID.
tcf:enumItem.name: TTBR0_EL1

tcf:enumItem.description: TTBR1_EL1.ASID defines the ASID.
tcf:enumItem.name: TTBR1_EL1

tcf:enumItem.description: Outer Shareable
tcf:enumItem.name: Outer_Shareable

tcf:enumItem.description: Inner Shareable
tcf:enumItem.name: Inner_Shareable

tcf:enumItem.description: Normal memory, Outer Non-cacheable
tcf:enumItem.name: Normal_memory_Outer_Non_cacheable

tcf:enumItem.description: Normal memory, Outer Write-Back Read-Allocate Write-Allocate Cacheable
tcf:enumItem.name: Normal_memory_Outer_Write_Back_Read_Allocate_Write_Allocate_Cacheable

tcf:enumItem.description: Normal memory, Outer Write-Through Read-Allocate No Write-Allocate Cacheable
tcf:enumItem.name: Normal_memory_Outer_Write_Through_Read_Allocate_No_Write_Allocate_Cacheable

tcf:enumItem.description: Normal memory, Outer Write-Back Read-Allocate No Write-Allocate Cacheable
tcf:enumItem.name: Normal_memory_Outer_Write_Back_Read_Allocate_No_Write_Allocate_Cacheable

tcf:enumItem.description: Normal memory, Inner Non-cacheable
tcf:enumItem.name: Normal_memory_Inner_Non_cacheable

tcf:enumItem.description: Normal memory, Inner Write-Back Read-Allocate Write-Allocate Cacheable
tcf:enumItem.name: Normal_memory_Inner_Write_Back_Read_Allocate_Write_Allocate_Cacheable

tcf:enumItem.name: Perform_translation_table_walks_using_TTBR0_EL1

tcf:enumItem.description: A TLB miss on an address that is translated using TTBR0_EL1 generates a Translation fault. No translation table walk is performed.

tcf:enumItem.description: 8 bit - the upper 8 bits of VTTBR_EL2 are ignored by the hardware, and treated as if they are all zeros, for every purpose except when reading back the register.
tcf:enumItem.name: _8_bit_the_upper_8_bits_of_VTTBR_EL2_are_ignored_by_the_hardware_and_treated_as_if_they_are_all_zeros_for_every_purpose_except_when_reading_back_the_register

tcf:enumItem.description: 16 bit - the upper 8 bits of VTTBR_EL2 are used for allocation and matching in the TLB.
tcf:enumItem.name: _16_bit_the_upper_8_bits_of_VTTBR_EL2_are_used_for_allocation_and_matching_in_the_TLB

tcf:enumItem.description: If TG0 is 00 (4KB granule), start at level 2. If TG0 is 10 (16KB granule) or 01 (64KB granule), start at level 3.
tcf:enumItem.name: If_TG0_is_00_4KB_granule_start_at_level_2

tcf:enumItem.description: If TG0 is 00 (4KB granule), start at level 1. If TG0 is 10 (16KB granule) or 01 (64KB granule), start at level 2.
tcf:enumItem.name: If_TG0_is_00_4KB_granule_start_at_level_1

tcf:enumItem.description: If TG0 is 00 (4KB granule), start at level 0. If TG0 is 10 (16KB granule) or 01 (64KB granule), start at level 1.
tcf:enumItem.name: If_TG0_is_00_4KB_granule_start_at_level_0
